personal.name: Khyle Mitchell
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & Software Engineer
personal.shortBio: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in building responsive web applications and mobile solutions. Committed to clean code, user-centric design, and continuous learning.

work.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
highlights: Led development of 5+ full-stack web applications using React and Node.js
Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization and database restructuring
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker

work.title: Full Stack Developer
highlights: Developed 15+ client websites using JavaScript, React, and Vue.js
Built RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express for various applications
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to implement responsive designs
Reduced page load times by 35% implementing lazy loading and code splitting

work.title: Junior Web Developer
highlights: Developed front-end features using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Assisted in building backend services with Python Flask
Fixed 200+ bugs reported through QA and user feedback
Participated in agile sprints and weekly code reviews
Software Engineering & Web Development
Database Design & Management
Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
Web Development
Systems Analysis
Network Administration

awards.description: Awarded for implementing an innovative performance optimization solution that reduced page load times

volunteer.title: Coding Mentor

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration, inventory management, and real-time notifications. Features React frontend with Redux state management, Node.js/Express backend, MongoDB database, and Stripe payment processing.
highlights: React + Redux for frontend state management
Node.js + Express backend with MongoDB
Stripe payment integration
Real-time order tracking
Admin dashboard for inventory management
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates using WebSocket technology. Allows teams to create projects, assign tasks, and track progress with live notifications.
highlights: Vue.js frontend with WebSocket support
Firebase backend for real-time database
Team collaboration features
Mobile responsive design
Real-time notifications
Task filtering and sorting

projects.title: Portfolio Generator
projects.description: JavaScript framework for generating responsive portfolio websites from JSON configuration. Features modular CSS architecture, component-based system, and FrutigerAero aesthetic design.
highlights: Responsive design from mobile to desktop
JSON-based configuration system
Modular CSS architecture
Component-based system
Animated background effects
Built-in dark theme support
